headline: Gaps in Oregon landfill emissions rule allow some operators to avoid reporting, group says
summary: A Beyond Toxics report argues that exemptions from Oregon’s landfill gas emissions rule have allowed operators to avoid monitoring large areas of their landfills. The group is supporting a bill it hopes would address the issue.
